description:
This course is about the Programming Language Python and the ins and outs of that language. This course will teach you all about Python as a language and has detailed examples throughout the course.

To get started on this course all you need is the desire to learn. The course includes an instruction on how to download Python. You will also be able learn print directive, lists, how to put comments, how to use operators, how to make loops, boolean expressions and conditional statements, as well as functions and classes. The course will take approximately 1.5 hours.
title: Python:  Learn Python Today And Become A True  Code Warrior
